Qhoyne0725199brwbqz29rl4bmoelg3zye19c48f1b1784862015-03-22T03:06:12ZThe Dragon Demands5014364/* References */[[Image:Qhoyne.png|thumb|right|200px|A map showing the location of the Qhoyne on the continent of Essos.]]
The '''Qhoyne''' is a river in [[Essos]]. It flows out of the [[Forest of Qohor]] south and west before it joins the massive [[Rhoyne]] at [[Dagger Lake]] (which is formed by the confluence of the two rivers). The [[Free City]] of [[Qohor]] lies on the river, near where it emerges from the Forest of Qohor.<ref>[http://viewers-guide.hbo.com/game-of-thrones/season2/#!/locations/myr/ HBO viewers guide, season 2 map, Myr entry]</ref>
sections.In the books: In the ''[[A Song of Ice and Fire]]'' novels, the Qhoyne is a notable river. [[Ships]] carrying minerals and trade pass south from Qohor along the river to distant [[Volantis]], although the river route is hazardous due to the presence of pirates on Dagger Lake. Qohor maintains a fleet of ships which control the river as far south as the lake.
